data.name: Personal Touch Loan
data.description: A great unsecured personal loan rate, along with the service and support that gives Regional Australia Bank the personal touch!

features.additionalInfo: Bank 24/7 wherever you are and whenever you want with RAB mobile and internet banking.
Fast approval times including digital upload of your Big 4 Bank account information saving you from the need to supply paper statements.
Ability to make extra payments or repay the loan in full early at no cost.
Flexible repayment options give you the ability to make repayments Weekly, Fortnightly, or Monthly.
Redraw is available at no cost enabling you to save for future expense by paying extra to your loan. A minimum redraw amount of $200 applies.

constraints.additionalInfo: A minimum loan amount of $8,000 applies to this product.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
Borrowers must demonstrate at least 6 months continuing employment history at the time of application.
Borrowers must be aged 16 or older to apply. Applicants under 18 years of age, but over 16 years, may only enter into a loan contract with an adult as co-applicant or guarantor.
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.
Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply.

fees.name: Approval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applied on approval of your Personal or Car loan, prior to the initial drawdown.

fees.name: PPSR Registration & Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when a security interest is registered or discharged against an asset you provide as security for the loan.

fees.name: Late Payment Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments by the repayment due date.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments and we are required to issue a default notice to you.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is per annum (p.a.). The Comparison rate is calculated on an unsecured loan amount of $10,000 over a term of 3 years. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the example given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.
